tool_description: Checks availability of diagnostic imaging equipment within specified date and time ranges, returning available time slots for scheduling appointments.

equipment_type.description: Type of imaging equipment (X-ray, Ultrasound, CT, MRI, Fluoroscopy)

error_messages: Invalid equipment type: Use one of [X-ray, Ultrasound, CT, MRI, Fluoroscopy].
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be in the future.
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 15 and 180 minutes.
Equipment not found: The specified equipment type is not available at this facility.
usage: Provide equipment_type, start_date, end_date, and duration_minutes to find available time slots for diagnostic imaging appointments.

available_slots.description: Array of available appointment time slots in date-time format

equipment_id.description: Unique identifier for the specific equipment unit

total_slots.description: Total number of available time slots found
